summary:
This tool allows  you to convert armor and clothing \"vanilla\" for the body of ADEC, Caribbean, ADEC TBBP and DMRA.
This script is based on the work of Theru and \"So Much Monsters\".
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/2523/adecmorph01.gif[/img]

This script is based on the work of Theru and \"So Much Monsters\".
this is not a plugin, i\'ts a Tool, created with Maxscript: a built-in scripting language that can be used to automate repetitive tasks for 3ds Max , 
from vanilla armor, you can get automatically armor for Adec, Caribbean, Adec TBBP and OBLIVION DMRA and vice versa, see the video for more details.


[color=yellow]The readme for the last version is an image in the pictures of this mod CHECK it out, or click in the link below[/color] \"Manual Scroll readme\"

[url=http://imageshack.us/a/img546/7847/hotfire.gif]Manual Scroll readme[/url]


Theru\'s mod :[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22267]Female automorph tool 3d max[/url]


[color=yellow]REQUIREMENTS[/color]
[color=red] 3dsmax 2009 to 2012 only English version,on 3dsmax 2013 not yet because there is none plugin that can read nif[/color]


[color=yellow]MY OTHER MOD[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30770]Adec Caribbean Body[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25070]Victorias High Heel walk Animation BBBB[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34713]The TBBP animation of Dragonfly with butt bounce  [/url]

[color=yellow]VIDEO[/color]
[youtube]FgFLYetQDy4[/youtube]

author: LeCid and ShaoMarc
